JobFullDesc: Are you an experienced, passionate pioneer in technology - a solutions builder, a roll-up-your-sleeves technologist who wants a daily collaborative environment, think-tank feel and share new ideas with your colleagues - without the extensive demands of travel? If so, consider an opportunity with our US Delivery Center - we are breaking the mold of a typical Delivery Center.  Our US Delivery Centers have been growing since 2014 with significant, continued growth on the horizon. Interested? Read more about our opportunity below... Work you'll do/Responsibilities   Our SAP Packaged Technology Service Line offers a complete range of implementation services in SAP's core and emerging applications, from business case development and system design to configuration, testing and deployment. SAP HANA Analytics Technologies  Our SAP HANA Analytics practice utilizes the latest technology from SAP to develop exciting, innovative solutions to our clients' most pressing business problems. We are looking for a SAP HANA Snr. Analytics professional to help expand our capabilities in this fast-growing space.  Illustrative responsibilities include:  Good understanding of the Business Processes. / Identify as-is processes and to-be processes   Map Business Processes to SAP. / Conduct Blueprint / Design workshops for one or more processes   Configure scenarios in relevant SAP modules   Write Functional Specification / Configuration documents   Ability to peer review documentation / Responsible for supporting and leading project tasks   Identifies key drivers of a defined problem and proposes solutions /Identifies and solves problems using analysis, experience, and judgment / Performs analysis and effective diagnosis of clients' issues   Selects the most relevant tools/techniques to meet specific client requirements   A significant contributor to work plans for components on engagements   Coordinates activities between work streams and identifies changes in scope   Develops solutions to client problems through application of personal experience and methods and tools; validates solutions to subject matter experts   Demonstrates accountability and contributions to the successful realization of client goals  The Team   From our centers, we work with Deloitte consultants to design, develop and build solutions to help clients reimagine, reshape and rewire the competitive fabric of entire industries. Our centers house a multitude of specialists, ranging from systems designers, architects and integrators, to creative digital experts, to cyber risk and human capital professionals. All work together on diverse projects from advanced preconfigured solutions and methodologies, to brand-building and campaign management. We are a unique blend of skills and experiences, yet we underline the value of each individual, providing customized career paths, fostering innovation and knowledge development with a focus on quality. The US Delivery Center supports a collaborative team culture where we work and live close to home with limited travel. Qualifications  Functional/technical proficiency with at least 2-3 full lifecycle SAP implementation   At least 6+ years of SAP HANA Analytics experience with the following:   SAP Native / Enterprise HANA   SAP HANA Cloud Platform Analytics / API Library   SAP BusinessObjects Cloud and Digital Boardroom   SAP SLT   HANA Predictive Analytics Engine (PAL)   HANA XS Engine   SQL Script Procedures   HANA Data Modeling techniques and HANA Studio   Bachelor's degree or equivalent professional experience   Able to collaborate with clients and have a strong desire to excel and be committed to gaining exposure to multiple industries while further developing your career   Strong configuration and design skills   Travel up to 20% annually (While 20% of travel is a requirement of the role, due to COVID-19, non-essential travel has been suspended until further notice   Must be willing to live or relocate to the Lake Mary, FL; Gilbert, AZ; or Mechanicsburg, PA area   Limited immigration sponsorship may be available  Preferred Skills  Ability to handle multiple clients and multiple team members with confidence   Potential and ability to manage small engagements or work streams within large engagements   Aptitude for trouble-shooting and problem-solving   Understanding of SAP Application architecture, processes, and configurations   Ability to identify opportunities to optimize performance of existing BW design for reporting and analytics   Experience creating and documenting functional and technical specifications   Certified in SAP HANA   Strong communication skills, both written and oral   Excellent teamwork and interpersonal skills
